cars.description: This is a 1990 Nissan Maxima with only 250000 miles on it. Standard transmission. Leather seats, power everything. Driver window is missing with plastic sheeting taped over the opening. Clutch has a tendency to burn out. Great starter car.
Chevy's take on the Toyota Camry - this beauty has minimal rust, AM radio and only 450000 miles.
This is the legend that started the Saturn line. It features fiberglass body panels and a tape deck. Only 150000 miles!
You gotta love a car with a CD player. If you're lucky and you hit the dash just right, the one in this car might even work. 280000 miles.
This one is OK if you don't want character or high maintenance. 80000 miles.
